id.description: The event subscription's ID, which is generated after creating an event subscription successfully.

direction.description: The SMS direction this event subscription subscribes to.

enabled.description: Whether or not the SMS event subscription is enabled.

endpoint_id.description:
The logging endpoint's ID, which is generated after creating a webhook or websocket successfully. If you plan to pair this event subscription with another logging endpoint,
please provide a valid webhook ID here.

include_internal.description: Whether or not to trigger SMS events for SMS sent between two users from the same company.

status.description: Whether or not to update on each SMS delivery status.

target_id.description: The ID of the specific target for which events should be sent.
